profileAlternative.name: Rachelle Palmer
profileAlternative.headline: Global Director, Atlas Technical Services Engineering at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary: Engineering Management with focus on SREs, DevOps, and SysAdmin. 14 years of experience in technology software engineering, implementation, and technical program management. Current focus is MongoDB, cloud operations and automation. Team size: 36 engineers.

aboutAlternative.text: Engineering Management with focus on SREs, DevOps, and SysAdmin. 14 years of experience in technology software engineering, implementation, and technical program management. Current focus is MongoDB, cloud operations and automation. Team size: 36 engineers.

positions.title: MongoDB
positions.description:
Technical Services Engineering is responsible for customer success with MongoDB, our tools ecosystem, and hardware sizing and set up for scalable, high availability architectures. We provide application support for backup, monitoring, automation tools, BI Connectors, drivers, backend as a service, and cloud products.

My day to day primarily is spent supervising a team of 18 engineers who are busy resolving network, security, operational, and systems integration issues for MongoDB's largest customers, as well as troubleshooting monitoring, backup, and automation tools for MongoDB deployments.

roles.title: Manager, Applications and Integration - North America. Technical Services Engineering Team.

positions.title:
Title
Technical Program Manager, Cloud Engineering
positions.description:
Program Manager - Cloud Engineering.

Primarily responsible for technical program management of the MongoDB Management Service, a software as a service (SaaS) product focused on monitoring, backup, and automation of MongoDB. Major responsibilities:
- Manage technical projects and features, working closely with software engineers and technical staff to develop and track release milestones and schedules for the many moving parts that need to come together for an agile, 3 week release cycle
- Develop a plan and schedule with well-defined milestones.
- Manage communication of progress/status within the engineering team and external to the team (with customers, partners, etc). Escalate issues as necessary.
- Assess the quality of releases through monitoring of incoming bugs. Identify quality issues and trends.
- Develop tools and processes to monitor and improve software engineering productivity
- Communicate product updates and release notes internally to other MongoDB teams

…
see more

positions.title: Senior Consultant & Product Manager - Deloitte Consulting Innovation (DCI)
positions.description:
From 2010 to early 2013, I served as a senior consultant on various technology projects. Typically, I was involved from statement of work through go live, serving clients through scoping and requirements to deployment. In this capacity, I have served as a tester, trainer, functional lead, technical lead, developer, data modeler, integration lead, and project manager. I facilitated interviews and meetings with internal and external partners to gather business requirements, discuss current and future state processes, and other surrounding context required to build technical solutions of all kinds, including mobile, web, and desktop custom applications.

In 2013, I moved to the Deloitte Consulting Innovation (DCI) team, and became responsible for the strategy and ideation of new technology, lines of business, or strategies for Deloitte USA. In this capacity, I lead and participated in Strategy and Product Ideation sessions, ran innovation challenges via Spigit, evaluated and developed innovative concepts, prototypes, pilot programs, pricing analysis, and designed/implemented new parts of our organizational structure (small teams, particularly Agile development teams).

As an example of the type of work
- DCI would receive a proposal
- A member of the team would evaluate it in lieu of our current offerings, market needs, and adjacency to future strategy
- Put together a business case, including pricing analysis, competitive analysis, cost estimates, and rough outline of project timeline and implementation details
- Present that proposal to teammates at DCI and Chief Innovation officer
- If approved, the proposal would be passed along by CIO to the board
- If approved, the DCI team member would commence early stage startup requirements, such as identifying facilities needs, nailing down the budget, and finding a leadership team for the project.
- Turn over the project to new leadership team
…

educations.title: Indiana University - Kelley School of Business

given.text:
Rachelle has been the best manager I have ever reported to. She's intelligent and honest, works fantastically under pressure and is always striving to solve real issues in the environments that she manages. I learned a great deal from her and continue to do so. Anyone who works for her should use the opportunity to grow and excel in their own careers. For those who work besides her, she is a force to be reckoned with and her opinion should always be seriously considered.
…
See more

I have been fortunate to have had the opportunity to work with Rachelle for a little over two years now at MongoDB during her time as a director for our Applications and Integrations support team, and more recently while she’s held a position as Global Director (Atlas Support) within the Technical Services Engineering organization. While working with Rachelle, she has shown time and time again her ability and desire to do what is best for our customers, our team, and the company. She has consistently gone above and beyond for those around her without hesitation. Throughout my time here, Rachelle has scaled the ever-growing Cloud Support team to nearly 40 global team members. She has also held a mentorship program to help guide those within the organization in developing their leadership skills, passing along the expertise she’s learned during her time as a leader to those around her. She has repeatedly solved complex issues with her technical knowledge, innovation, and passion. I know with absolute certainty that Rachelle would be an asset to any team she’s apart of and they would be extremely lucky to have her.
…
See more

received.text: I highly recommend Alan as a colleague and a technical professional. He is diligent, organized, and clear in his approach to challenges; he is dependable, pleasant, and unfailingly positive in his outlook no matter the situation. Our team and our customers rely on him heavily and I consider myself lucky to work with him.

It was a true pleasure working with Jarrod on the 3D printing discovery center initiative at Deloitte Consulting. He is clear, strategic, focused, and also approaches challenges with humor and enthusiasm.
